task.title: Examining a key's properties
task.shortdesc: Use this procedure to look at the properties that were specified when a key was created.

step.cmd: If necessary, open the Signing and Keys view by selecting Window Show View Other and then selecting MOTODEV Studio Signing and Keys from the list of views. Note that this view is part of the MOTODEV Studio for Android perspective and is thus normally opened when you switch to that perspective.

In the Signing and Keys view select the key whose properties you want to see. Note that you may need to click the disclosure triangle next to the keystore containing the key to expose that keystore's contents.

step.stepresult: The Key Properties dialog is displayed, which shows all of the properties that were specified when the key was created. The Validity period, specified as a duration (in years) when the key was created, is shown as two dates: the date the key was created, and the date that the key expires.

step.cmd: Click OK when you are done reviewing the key's properties.
